train_test_functions module¶

Module to define the train loop, the test loop and a global loop who combine both

train_test_functions.global_loop(model, model_name, train, test)[source]¶

Use training and testing functions on the model. Save as csv the accuracy and the loss on the test dataset in results folder for each epoch of each loop. Save the last model calculated in results folder.

Parameters¶

model : nn.modules.Module model_name : string train : DataLoader test : DataLoader

train_test_functions.testing(model, test, criterion)[source]¶

Test the model on the test dataset

Parameters¶

model : nn.modules.Module test : DataLoader criterion : nn.modules.loss

Returns¶

test accuracy : float test loss : float

train_test_functions.torch_loop(model, model_name, train, test)[source]¶

Use training and testing functions on the torch resnet model. Save as csv the accuracy and the loss on the test dataset in results folder. Save the model calculated in results folder.

Parameters¶

model : nn.modules.Module model_name : string train : DataLoader test : DataLoader

train_test_functions.training(model, train, optimizer, criterion)[source]¶

Train the model with the train dataset

Parameters¶

model : nn.modules.Module train : DataLoader optimizer : orch.optim.Optimizer criterion : nn.modules.loss

Returns¶

train accuracy : float train loss : float

Residual Learning
